title: Is Mahindra Bolero Neo safe for you? The SUV scores only one star in safety ratings
description: The Mahindra Bolero Neo received a one-star rating for both child and adult safety in the Global NCAP tests, highlighting its performance in occupant safety. The SUV lacks key safety features, unlike other Mahindra models with higher safety ratings.
